summary: Comprehensive E2E testing of Green Arcadian Multi-Portal system completed successfully. Backend: 100% pass rate (26/26 tests). Frontend: All core flows working - Admin login, dashboard, inventory, projects, orders, user management. Customer registration flow working with pending approval. Public website fully functional with navigation, shop, and product display.
passed_tests: Admin Orders - List, View, Status Update
critical_code_review_comments: All data-testid attributes present for interactive elements
Backend API endpoints properly excluding MongoDB _id from responses
JWT authentication working correctly with role-based access
Proper error handling for invalid credentials (401/403 responses)
seed_data_creation: Test data created via API tests: plants, projects, orders, AMC subscriptions, RFQs, export docs, production batches
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features tested and working. Admin portal fully functional. Customer registration creates pending accounts requiring admin approval. Public website with shop and product pages working correctly. Backend has 26 comprehensive tests covering all major API endpoints. Test credentials: admin@greenarcadian.com / admin123

admin_portal.dashboard: Working - displays stats for users, inventory, projects, orders, AMC, partners
admin_portal.inventory: Working - CRUD operations, search, filter by category
admin_portal.orders: Working - list, view details, status management
admin_portal.user_management: Working - list users, filter by status/role, pending approvals

public_website.shop: Working - 12 products displayed with category filters
